alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 10:21PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...VERY WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE WIND PRONE AREAS OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING THROUGH 2 AM SATURDAY... West winds between 25 to 35 MPH with gusts up to 50 MPH this evening are expected to slowly decrease after 2 AM Saturday. Although wind gusts should remain between 50 to 55 MPH through most of this day, brief gusts of 60 MPH are possible around Arlington and Bordeaux. Those traveling in light weight and high profile vehicles are urged to use caution along Interstate 80 between Rawlins and Cheyenne late this evening into early Saturday morning.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
